name: UIMutableUserNotificationAction
desc: Important: UIMutableUserNotificationAction is deprecated in iOS 10. Use UNNotificationAction instead. A UIMutableUserNotificationAction object represents a modifiable version of the UIUserNotificationAction class.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The string that you use internally to identify the action.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The localized string to use as the button title for the action.

items.name: var activationMode: UIUserNotificationActivationMode
items.desc: The mode in which to run the app when the action is performed.

items.name: var isAuthenticationRequired: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the user must unlock the device before the action is performed.

items.name: var isDestructive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the action is destructive.

items.name: var behavior: UIUserNotificationActionBehavior
items.desc: The custom behavior (if any) that the action supports.

items.name: var parameters: [AnyHashable : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of additional parameters to include with the action.
